nodes.title: Switch default search provider to DuckDuckGo
Bump for release v0.10.0 (with FastLane metadata)
Creating Initial Strings for Bulgarian Language
Add support for choosing a definition provider
Don't show points next to already found words
Add option to show word counts by length
Clean up and/or improve some parts of the display
Change Trie data structure from bits to Strings
Fix typo in build file comment
Updated "Get it on..." logos to new artwork.
Enable proguard to reduce apk size
Updated logo to adhere to the material design specs better.
Script for pulling scripts from Weblate
Add "Get it on Google Play" badge after uploading to the Play Store.
Update "Get it on F-Droid" button image.
Rename methods/variables in trie code to clarify behaviour.
Bump for release v3.0.0 - Fix multiplayer boards with Qu and Base64 encode.
Host lexica metadata (dictionaries, etc) as .json files on GitHub pages.
Initial API published to GitHub pages
Bump for release v2.6.0 - Additional Spanish dictionary
Bump for release v2.5.2 - Added lithuanian, updated other translations.
Spanish language without accents but with Ntilde
Bump for release v2.5.1 - Updated translations.
Dark navigation bar + bump for release v2.5.0
Bump for release v2.4.1 - Updated translations.
Show how many words in multiplayer befroe inviting.
Bump for release v2.2.1 - Update translations.
Additional de, fr, and ru dictionaries.
Bump for release v2.0.0-alpha6 (high score table and viewing found words)
Forgot to internationalise the title for the high scores activity.
Migrate from Travis CI to GitHub Actions.
View high scores and found words
Fix crash preventing any games in 2.0.0-alpha1
Made the preferences not retain the margin reserved to icons
Fix broken "analyseLanguage" tasks used for generating letter probability distributions.
Default to Wiktionary when defining words for all languages
Try to ensure boards with at least 45 words.
Allow 'cancel' option when resetting high scores.
Only use greyscale colours for hint-mode in the high contrast theme.
Use wiktionary to define Russian words
Add "High Contrast" theme (just black and white (+ a little grey)
Use appropriate hint mode colours for dark theme.
WIP: Implement sorting modes for "missed words" end game screen #101
Use Fastlane Screengrab to automatically produce i18n screenshots.
Default to Android system language dictionary
WIP: Dark theme - Hardcoded values - build success
Added uniq sort option, removed duplicated words.
Fix letter points for all languages
More international dictionaries: German, French, Spanish, Italian , Dutch, Catalonian
Pull translations (and fix weirdness due to manual translation changes).
Update translations with DDG instead of Google
